snippet: The North’s nuclear weapons “are neither a political bargaining chip nor a thing for economic dealings,” the official Korean Central News Agency quoted officials as saying.
abstract: North Korean leader Kim Jong-un announces 'new strategic line' that defies warnings from United States, saying his country is determined to rebuild its economy in face of international sanctions while simultaneously expanding its nuclear weapons arsenal.
lead_paragraph: The North’s nuclear weapons “are neither a political bargaining chip nor a thing for economic dealings,” the official Korean Central News Agency quoted officials as saying.

headline.seo: North Korea Vows to Keep Nuclear Arms and Fix Economy
headline.main: North Korea Vows to Keep Nuclear Arms and Fix Economy
headline.print_headline: North Korea Vows to Keep Nuclear Arms and Fix Economy
